Traits.Name: Quick Movement
Traits.Content: The Giant Silverfish can move through the space of any creature that is Medium or smaller.

Traits.Name: Whispering Scales
Traits.Content: The Giant Silverfish has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made in dim light or darkness.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) acid damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Dash and Dive
Actions.Content: The Giant Silverfish dashes through its target's space, making an opportunity attack against a creature in its path. On a hit, the attack deals 3 (1d6) slashing damage. If the target is hit, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take an additional 4 (1d8) poison damage.
